text:
Oh wow I actually saw that but I just now realized I read it differently. I thought it meant like "women, [transgender and non-binary [women]]"

Where I added a comma after trans, and added the "and/or" to try to make it more inclusive.

I didn't realize that you could also read yours as already pretty inclusive haha

elements.text:
Oh wow I actually saw that but I just now realized I read it differently. I thought it meant like "women, [transgender and non-binary [women]]"

Where I added a comma after trans, and added the "and/or" to try to make it more inclusive.

I didn't realize that you could also read yours as already pretty inclusive haha

text: Where in yours I read it as only women (transgender women and non-binary women). Where in mine I tried to also include non-binary men, and transmen
